name: Curse Lsland
description:
Game plot:
A hurricane killed Frank’s boat near an unknown island. He was the only survivor on board. After some exploration, it was discovered that there were many terrible things hidden here...
Content and gameplay
-The player operator fights with zombies
-A variety of different firearms and throwing weapons
-Explore the vast map
Game features:
－Real and exciting game mode in the first person.
-Players need to collect materials on the island to fight against zombies.
-Solve the many mysteries on the island and escape.
